metadata.title: CVE-2019-8427 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
daemonControl in includes/functions.php in ZoneMinder before 1.32.3 allows command injection via shell metacharacters.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-8427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
